keys: cambio de la entalpia de la combustión

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Standard enthalpy change of combustion of sulphur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Standardenthalpieänderung der Verbrennung des 
Schwefels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement standard d'enthalpie de la combustion 
du soufre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança padrão do enthalpy da combustão do 
enxôfre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento standard di entalpia di combustione di
zolfo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπη αλλαγή ενθαλπίας της καύσης του θείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio estándar de la entalpia de la combustión
del sulfuro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the combustion of sulphur forming sulphur dioxide and its standard enthalpy change. The reaction is exothermic as 296.8 kJ/mol is lost from system to the surroundings</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy change of combustion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hess's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Joule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Verbrennung des 
Schwefels Schwefeldioxid und seine Standardenthalpieänderung bildend.
Die Reaktion ist exothermisch, da 296.8 kJ/mol vom System zu den
Umlagerungen verloren ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la combustion du soufre
formant l'anhydride sulfureux et son changement standard d'enthalpie. 
La réaction est exothermique car 296.8 kJ/mol sont détruits du
système aux environnements</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a combustão do enxôfre 
que dá forma ao dióxido de enxôfre e a sua mudança padrão do 
enthalpy. A reação é exothermic porque 296.8 kJ/mol são 
perdidos do sistema aos arredors</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la combustione di 
zolfo che forma l'anidride solforosa ed il relativo cambiamento 
standard di entalpia. La reazione è esotermica poichè 296.8 
kJ/mol sono persi dal sistema ai dintorni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την καύση του θείου που 
διαμορφώνει το διοξείδιο του θείου και την πρότυπη αλλαγή 
ενθαλπίας της. Η αντίδραση είναι εξωθερμική όπως 296,8 
kJ/to μορ. χάνονται από το σύστημα στα περίχωρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la combustión del 
sulfuro que forma el dióxido de sulfuro y su cambio estándar de la 
entalpia. La reacción es exotérmica pues 296.8 kJ/mol se 
pierden de sistema a los alrededores</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
